name: Lil Smasher
description:
Gary is a rotten little gremlin who likes to break stuff. He's snuck into the world famous "Museum of Priceless Stuff" to destroy rare artifacts with his laser-sighted slingshot. But.. Gary is not very bright. He needs your help to solve the puzzles that unlock the museum's treasures.

Lil Smasher is a physics based puzzle game with 21 insanely fun levels with rich 3D graphics.

Features:
- Optimized for iPhone 5
- Destroy the rarest artifacts
- 21 insanely fun levels and more to come in updates
